scripts.predev: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); for(const d of ['.next','.next-build','out','build']){ try{ if(fs.existsSync(d)) fs.rmSync(d,{recursive:true,force:true}); }catch(e){ console.warn('Cleanup warning for', d, e.message); } }"
scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); for(const d of ['.next','.next-build','out','build']){ try{ if(fs.existsSync(d)) fs.rmSync(d,{recursive:true,force:true}); }catch(e){ console.warn('Cleanup warning for', d, e.message); } }"
scripts.export:build: next build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const src=['out','.next-build'].find(d=>fs.existsSync(d)); if(!src){console.error('Missing static export dir (out/ or .next-build/)'); process.exit(1);} if(fs.existsSync('build')) fs.rmSync('build',{recursive:true,force:true}); fs.cpSync(src,'build',{recursive:true}); console.log('Static site prepared in build/ from '+src+'/');"
scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const src=['out','.next-build'].find(d=>fs.existsSync(d)); if(!src){console.error('Missing static export dir (out/ or .next-build/)'); process.exit(1);} if(fs.existsSync('build')) fs.rmSync('build',{recursive:true,force:true}); fs.cpSync(src,'build',{recursive:true}); console.log('Static site prepared in build/ from '+src+'/');"
scripts.build:static: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const src=['out','.next-build'].find(d=>fs.existsSync(d)); if(!src){console.error('Missing static export dir (out/ or .next-build/). Run npm run build first.'); process.exit(1);} if(fs.existsSync('build')) fs.rmSync('build',{recursive:true,force:true}); fs.cpSync(src,'build',{recursive:true}); console.log('Copied '+src+' to build/.');"
